title: HTML and CSS Mastery
description: Learn the foundations of web development with HTML and CSS. This course will enable you to create responsive, visually appealing websites and user interfaces, covering everything from basic syntax to advanced styling techniques.
about: This course is tailored for beginners and aspiring web developers. By mastering HTML and CSS, you will gain the ability to structure and style websites effectively, implement responsive design principles, and build visually compelling user experiences.

highlights.name: HTML Basics
highlights.description: Learn the structure of web pages, semantic elements, and attributes.

highlights.name: CSS Fundamentals
highlights.description: Master the basics of styling, selectors, and properties.

highlights.name: Responsive Design
highlights.description: Create mobile-friendly websites using Flexbox, Grid, and Media Queries.

highlights.name: CSS Frameworks
highlights.description: Introduction to frameworks like Bootstrap and Tailwind CSS.

roles.title: Frontend Developer
roles.description: Specialize in creating structured and visually engaging web pages.

roles.title: UI/UX Designer
roles.description: Design user interfaces that are both functional and visually appealing.

roles.title: Web Developer
roles.description: Build responsive, accessible websites for various industries.

roles.title: Freelance Web Designer
roles.description: Offer web design services using foundational web technologies.

faq.question: Do I need any prior coding experience to join this course?
faq.answer: No, this course is beginner-friendly and starts with the basics.

faq.question: What kind of projects will I build?
faq.answer: You will work on responsive web pages, interactive landing pages, and portfolio websites.

faq.question: Will I learn how to make my websites responsive?
faq.answer: Yes, the course includes responsive design techniques using CSS Grid and Flexbox.

faq.question: Will I get a certificate after completing the course?
faq.answer: Yes, you will receive a certificate upon successful completion of the course.

faq.question: What tools will I need for this course?
faq.answer: You will need a text editor (like VS Code) and a modern web browser.
